item.title: Indie Rock playlist for 12/2012
item.description: Including: Alt-J, Arctic Monkeys, Cults, Japandroids, Neutral Milk Hotel, Said The Whale, Tame Impala, The Shins, Tokyo Police Club, Yeasayer.

item.title: Indie Rock playlist for 11/2012
item.description: Including: Fleet Foxes, Grizzly Bear, Lcd Soundsystem, Local Natives, Portugal. The Man, The Antlers, The Avalanches, The Strokes, Tokyo Police Club, Wavves.

item.title: Indie Rock playlist for 10/2012
item.description: Including: Beirut, Bombay Bicycle Club, Deerhunter, Metric, Modest Mouse, Portugal. The Man, Real Estate, Tame Impala, The Shins, Vampire Weekend.

item.title: Indie Rock playlist for 9/2012
item.description: Including: Beirut, Bloc Party, Bombay Bicycle Club, Modest Mouse, Quiet Little Voices, Starfucker, Strfkr, Sufjan Stevens, The Fratellis, The Wombats.

item.title: Indie Rock playlist for 8/2012
item.description: Including: Arcade Fire, Arctic Monkeys, Black Kids, Cloud Nothings, First Day Of My Life, Grizzly Bear, Los Campesinos!, The Shins, Two Door Cinema Club, Walk The Moon.

item.title: Indie Rock playlist for 7/2012
item.description: Including: Fleet Foxes, Lcd Soundsystem, San Cisco, Sleep Alone, Teeth Like Gods Shoeshine, The Drums, The National, Tune-Yards, Wlt, Yuck.

item.title: Indie Rock playlist for 6/2012
item.description: Including: Animal Collective, Arctic Monkeys, Cloud Nothings, Daniel Johnston, Modest Mouse, Neutral Milk Hotel, The Dead Milkmen, The Gaslight Anthem, The New Pornographers, The Shins.

item.title: Indie Rock playlist for 5/2012
item.description: Including: Arcade Fire, Arctic Monkeys, Born Ruffians, Broken Bells, The Naked And Famous, The Strokes, The Temper Trap, Washed Out, We Were Promised Jetpacks, Whitest Boy Alive.

item.title: Indie Rock playlist for 4/2012
item.description: Including: Arcade Fire, Arctic Monkeys, Silversun Pickups, Strfkr, The Arcade Fire, The Shins, The Strokes, The Temper Trap, The Thermals, Vampire Weekend.
